quote: All that was great in the past was ridiculed, condemned, combated, suppressed â€” only to emerge all the more powerfully, all the more triumphantly from the struggle.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Life is and will ever remain an equation incapable of solution, but it contains certain known factors.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Invention is the most important product of man's creative brain. The ultimate purpose is the complete mastery of mind over the material world, the harnessing of human nature to human needs.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
author: Dean Kamen

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain.
author: Stephen Hawking
